Our server is new and we are looking for new members to join our community and help build a very fun server! [/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][IMG]http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape2/images/3/30/Runecrafting_Emote.gif/revision/20101103220305[/img][/CENTER] [HR][/HR][CENTER][SIZE=6][COLOR=#000000][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZAjOEEf.png[/img] [/COLOR][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=garamond][B][COLOR=#ff8c00]Server Features[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][COLOR=#000000][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZAjOEEf.png[/img][/COLOR][/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE] [FONT=palatino linotype][COLOR=#ffffff][SIZE=3]✯ Flawless Player vs. Player ✯ Unique and Stable Drop Table ✯ 10+ Entertaining Mini-games ✯ Customized Home / Eye Pleasing ✯ Stable Economy (1 - 2147m) ✯ Active Staff Team ✯ Friendly Item Database (No Customs) ✯ Over 24+ Different Skills to Train

item.title: Medieval Realm - 317 (New)
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Thank you for all the support, server is moving along and growing be sure to register an account with us and help support our server by ::voting! We now have a Voting Shop, 2 Donation Shops, Pest Control, RFD, GP Shops, DominionTower, Dungeoneering, Blast Furnace, and Castle Wars. We now support Highscores, Update Client, Toxic Blowpipe, Toxic Staff of the Dead, Armadyl C’Bow, and 1 New Bossing Pet. We are hoping to see some more new items in-game available though-out the game.

Thank for staying tuned I hope we can see some new faces soon! )

Read full topic
